text: Jean-Pierre Baeumler (1 July 1948 â€“ 22 January 2021) was a French politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He was born in Oberbruck, France. From 1989 to 2014, Baeumler was Mayor of Thann, Haut-Rhin. From 1988 to 1993 and 1997 to 2002, Baemuler was a member of the National Assembly. Baeumler died on 22 January 2021 at the age of 71. ==References== Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Haut-Rhin Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Jean-Pierre Baeumler
